verses.text: \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* perisheth, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* layeth \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* mercy \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w taken|strong="H0622"\w* \w away|strong="H0622"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* understandeth; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w taken|strong="H0622"\w* \w away|strong="H0622"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H5117"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w let|strong="H5117"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* \w that|strong="H1980"\w* hath \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w uprightness|strong="H5228"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0859"\w* \w draw|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* hither, \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2181"\w* sorceress, \w the|strong="H2181"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2181"\w* \w adulterer|strong="H5003"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2181"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*.

\w Upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* jested? \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w opened|strong="H7337"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w wide|strong="H7337"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w put|strong="H6310"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*? \w are|strong="H6588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* wicked \w children|strong="H3206"\w*, \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*,

\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* seek \w your|strong="H3605"\w* comfort \w in|strong="H6086"\w* idols \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, sacrificing \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w in|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* torrents, \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*?

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* parts \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* torrent \w is|strong="H1571"\w* thy \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*, \w this|strong="H0428"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* thy \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*: \w and|strong="H4503"\w* thou hast \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* libations \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, thou hast \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*. \w Shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w I|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* angry \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*?

\w Upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w lofty|strong="H1364"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* thou hast \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* hast \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thither \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* victims.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w post|strong="H4201"\w* thou best \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thy \w remembrance|strong="H2146"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast discovered thyself \w near|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* hast received \w an|strong="H7760"\w* adulterer: thou hast \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* thy \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: thou hast \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w open|strong="H1540"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* thou hast adorned thyself \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* hast \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* thy \w perfumes|strong="H7547"\w*. Thou hast \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thy \w messengers|strong="H6735"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* wast debased \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* hell.

Thou hast \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w wearied|strong="H3021"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: \w yet|strong="H4672"\w* thou saidst \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* rest: thou hast \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w asked|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* hast thou \w been|strong="H5769"\w* solicitous \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w lied|strong="H3576"\w*, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* \w mindful|strong="H2142"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w thought|strong="H3820"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*? \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w silent|strong="H2814"\w*, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* seeth \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* thou hast forgotten \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* thy \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* thee.

\w When|strong="H0776"\w* thou shalt \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, let thy companies \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee, \w but|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w off|strong="H5375"\w*, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* breeze \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w*, \w but|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* putteth \w his|strong="H3605"\w* trust \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1870"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H1870"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Make|strong="H7311"\w* \w a|strong="H7311"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: give free passage, \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* out \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w path|strong="H1870"\w*, \w take|strong="H7311"\w* \w away|strong="H6437"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* stumblingblocks out \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w my|strong="H7311"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w High|strong="H4791"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Eminent \w that|strong="H3588"\w* inhabiteth eternity: \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \w who|strong="H0559"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* place, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w contrite|strong="H1792"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w humble|strong="H8217"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w revive|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w humble|strong="H8217"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w revive|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w contrite|strong="H1792"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* unto \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w end|strong="H5331"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* go forth \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* breathings \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* covetousness \w I|strong="H1870"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w I|strong="H1870"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*: \w I|strong="H1870"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* face \w from|strong="H3820"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w*: \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w he|strong="H5221"\w* went \w away|strong="H7726"\w* wandering \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w brought|strong="H5148"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w back|strong="H7999"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* restored comforts \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w mourn|strong="H0057"\w* \w for|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* raging \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w waves|strong="H4325"\w* thereof cast \w up|strong="H1644"\w* dirt \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w mire|strong="H2916"\w*.

\w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
